title: Kiss of the Fur Queen - complex experience

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Highway uses literary elements and techniques to portray Okimasis’ complex experience.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Highway uses literary elements and techniques to portray Okimasis’ complex experience.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
